name: PerformanceTrendProjection
short_description:
The project aims at developing web services (can also be  used as stand alone java program) for analyzing the scalabilty tests wrt CPU and Memory and project the maximum users that the system can support. The service would take the following as input
- No. of Users Vs CPU utilization
- No. of Users Vs Memory Utilization
- Maximum available memory

The tool will then try to fit the values in to the following graphs
- Logarithmic
- Exponential
- Polynomial

and then find the right R(square) value to find the right trend and project the maximum users that the system can support based on the trend.

The front end to display graphs would be developed at a later stage.
summary: End user scalabilty projection based on CPU/Memory utilization
